msContents.summary: Octavo bifolium from a manuscript almanac otherwise unknown in manuscript or print, comprising a page titled An ephemeris of the planets motions 1747; an almanac page for January; and two pages of discussion of the eclipses during the year, for the latitude of Philadelphia. The eclipse pages are decorated with three lunar faces drawn in ink and tinted with ink or watercolor.
